movie.title: Neha
movie.description_intro: A wonderful dark tale of coming of age in a country in transformation - then Czechoslovakia (now Slovakia) in 1990s. Against the backdrop of a regime change and general crisis of basic values, a young man is finding his way into adult life. Playing a part in a love (hate?) triangle he does not fully understand until the conclusion, he desperately tries to make sense of the unpredictable behavior of the other two main characters which is linked to the secrets lurking in their past. All this while he is not sure about his own role in a world where yesterday's truths mean nothing today.
movie.description_full: A wonderful dark tale of coming of age in a country in transformation - then Czechoslovakia (now Slovakia) in 1990s. All this while he is not sure about his own role in a world where yesterday's truths mean nothing today.

movies.title: Druid Peak
movies.summary: A troubled teen is sent to live with his estranged father, a park ranger. During his time there, he develops an unusual affinity with and passion for the wolves in a local pack.
movies.description_full: A troubled teen is sent to live with his estranged father, a park ranger. During his time there, he develops an unusual affinity with and passion for the wolves in a local pack.
movies.synopsis: A troubled teen is sent to live with his estranged father, a park ranger. During his time there, he develops an unusual affinity with and passion for the wolves in a local pack.

movies.title: Sunny in the Dark
movies.summary: A reclusive family therapist craving the solitude of an exclusive downtown loft doesn't realize that he's not the only person living in the same space.
movies.description_full: A reclusive family therapist craving the solitude of an exclusive downtown loft doesn't realize that he's not the only person living in the same space.

movies.title: Anchors
movies.summary: A month away from his impending marriage, a man (Will Estes, BLUE BLOODS) reconnects with an old flame (Devin Kelley, CHERNOBYL DIARIES).
movies.description_full: A month away from his impending marriage, a man (Will Estes, BLUE BLOODS) reconnects with an old flame (Devin Kelley, CHERNOBYL DIARIES).
movies.synopsis: A month away from his impending marriage, a man (Will Estes, BLUE BLOODS) reconnects with an old flame (Devin Kelley, CHERNOBYL DIARIES).

movies.title: Youth in Revolt
movies.summary: At 16, Nick Twisp is wry about his teen funk: he lives in Oakland with his sex-addled mother; his father's child support is her meal ticket. While camping in Ukiah, Nick meets Sheeni: for him, it's love at first sight. Nick has to figure out how to get his father a job in Ukiah, then how to get sent to live with his father, then how to get close to Sheeni, whose religious parents may want her sent away from temptation to a boarding school. There's also Sheeni's all-American boyfriend to contend with. Overwhelmed by the challenges, Nick's about to give up when he conjures an alter ego who whispers revolt into his ear. Nick is not altogether hapless, but can this end well?
